rows.label: qst103601_msg0001
rows.name:
I wonder if they sell
them in the shops...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0002
rows.name:
My friend is moving away, so
I wanted to make a pendant I
saw in a book as a present.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0003
rows.name: That's a wonderful idea.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0004
rows.name:
Having a memory to hold onto can
ease the pain of loneliness.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0005
rows.name:
Even without memories, records
remain. Just like us, I suppose.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0006
rows.name:
...I wish I had records of
my time with Neferu-sama.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0007
rows.name:
It was a sudden succession
this time, so it cannot
be helped, Wadatsumi.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0008
rows.name:
All we can do is tell you
what Meleph-sama and I know.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0009
rows.name:
After this journey is over, you
can simply make new memories.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0010
rows.name: You are right...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0011
rows.name:
Say, young lady, what kind
of pendant are you making?

rows.label: qst103601_msg0012
rows.name:
I want to use the legendary
Nenju Kokedama from the World
Tree to make a good luck charm.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0013
rows.name: But they don't sell it in the shops...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0014
rows.name:
A good luck charm... You want
to make your friend happy.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: qst103601_msg0016
rows.name:
His mom died... so he
said he's moving away.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0017
rows.name: I want him to be happy.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0018
rows.name: You've experienced a sad parting...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0019
rows.name:
Everyone... may I be permitted
to assist this young lady?

rows.label: qst103601_msg0020
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0021
rows.name:
I will take responsibility
for obtaining it.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0022
rows.name: Really? I'm so happy!

rows.label: qst103601_msg0023
rows.name:
I want to make it before he
leaves, so please bring it soon!
